SEARCH
Package com.pizzashop.project4

Class StoreOrdersController

java.lang.Object
com.pizzashop.project4.StoreOrdersController
public class StoreOrdersController extends Object
Controller class for managing store orders in a pizza ordering application. This class handles the user interface related to viewing and managing all orders placed in the store, including displaying order details, cancelling orders, and exporting order data.

  • Method Details

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController(MainMenuController controller)
      Sets the main controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The main menu controller to be used.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller, setting up the necessary objects and state for managing store orders. This method is called after the FXML fields have been injected.

    • onComboBoxAction

      private void onComboBoxAction()
      Handles actions when a selection is made in the order selection ComboBox. This method updates the display based on the selected order.

    • displaySelectedOrder

      private void displaySelectedOrder(String orderNumber)
      Displays the selected order's details in the user interface.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - The number of the order to display.

    • displayNone

      private void displayNone()
      Clears the display when no order is selected.

    • handleExportButton

      private void handleExportButton()
      Handles the action of the export button. This method is responsible for exporting the store orders.

    • handleCancelButton

      private void handleCancelButton()
      Handles the action of the cancel button. This method is responsible for removing the selected order from the store orders.
